quiz.question: pounce __ ____
quiz.explanation: 猛扑，猛扑猎物。The cat would pounce on prey with lightning speed. 猫会以闪电般的速度猛扑猎物。

quiz.question: ___ ___ reminisce
quiz.explanation: 回忆，坐着回忆。The elderly friends would sit and reminisce about their youth. 年迈的朋友们会坐着回忆他们的青春。

quiz.question: _________ deduce
quiz.explanation: 推断，逻辑地推断。The detective could logically deduce the criminal's identity. 侦探可以逻辑地推断出罪犯的身份。

quiz.question: puce _____
quiz.explanation: 紫褐色，紫褐色连衣裙。She wore an elegant puce dress to the gala. 她穿着优雅的紫褐色连衣裙参加晚会。

quiz.question: ______ barricade
quiz.explanation: 路障，警察路障。The police barricade blocked access to the crime scene. 警察路障阻止了进入犯罪现场。

quiz.question: ______ marmalade
quiz.explanation: 果酱，橙子果酱。She spread orange marmalade on her morning toast. 她在早餐吐司上涂橙子果酱。

quiz.question: ________ serenade
quiz.explanation: 小夜曲，浪漫的小夜曲。The musician performed a romantic serenade beneath her window. 音乐家在她的窗下演奏了浪漫的小夜曲。

quiz.question: _____ grenade
quiz.explanation: 手榴弹，投掷手榴弹。The soldier prepared to throw grenade at the enemy position. 士兵准备向敌人阵地投掷手榴弹。

quiz.question: ______ spade
quiz.explanation: 铁锹，园艺铁锹。The gardener used a garden spade to dig the flower bed. 园丁用园艺铁锹挖花坛。

quiz.question: dissuade _______
quiz.explanation: 劝阻，劝阻某人。She tried to dissuade someone from making a rash decision. 她试图劝阻某人做出草率的决定。

quiz.question: evade _____
quiz.explanation: 逃避，逃避税收。It is illegal to evade taxes. 逃避税收是非法的。

quiz.question: ____ pervade
quiz.explanation: 弥漫，恐惧弥漫。A sense of fear pervade the abandoned building. 一种恐惧感弥漫在废弃的建筑中。

quiz.question: recede ____ ________
quiz.explanation: 后退，退入远方。The mountains would recede into distance as we drove away. 当我们驶离时，山峦会退入远方。

quiz.question: precede ______
quiz.explanation: 在前，在演讲之前。A moment of silence would precede speech. 演讲前会有片刻的沉默。

quiz.question: concede ______
quiz.explanation: 承认，承认失败。The candidate refused to concede defeat until all votes were counted. 候选人拒绝承认失败，直到所有选票都被计算在内。

quiz.question: ____ stampede
quiz.explanation: 惊跑，野生惊跑。The loud noise caused a wild stampede of cattle. 巨大的噪音引起了牛群的野生惊跑。

quiz.question: impede ________
quiz.explanation: 阻碍，阻碍进展。Bad weather would impede progress on the construction project. 恶劣的天气会阻碍建设项目的进展。

quiz.question: bide ____
quiz.explanation: 等待，等待时机。The patient hunter would bide time until the perfect moment. 耐心的猎人会等待时机直到完美的时刻。

quiz.question: confide __ ______
quiz.explanation: 吐露，向朋友吐露。She needed someone to confide in friend about her troubles. 她需要有人向朋友吐露她的烦恼。

quiz.question: chide ______
quiz.explanation: 责备，温和地责备。The teacher would chide gently the tardy student. 老师会温和地责备迟到的学生。

quiz.question: snide ______
quiz.explanation: 讽刺的，讽刺的评论。His snide remark hurt her feelings. 他讽刺的评论伤害了她的感情。

quiz.question: override ____
quiz.explanation: 推翻，推翻否决。Congress voted to override veto from the president. 国会投票推翻总统的否决。

quiz.question: ____ stride
quiz.explanation: 大步，长大步。He walked with a confident long stride. 他自信地迈着长大步走。

quiz.question: ___ astride
quiz.explanation: 跨坐，跨坐着。The cowboy would sit astride his horse. 牛仔会跨坐在他的马上。

quiz.question: ___________ subside
quiz.explanation: 消退，洪水消退。It took days for the floodwaters subside after the storm. 暴风雨后，洪水消退花了好几天。

quiz.question: ____ backside
quiz.explanation: 臀部，裸露的臀部。The toddler ran around with his bare backside. 蹒跚学步的孩子光着裸露的臀部跑来跑去。

quiz.question: underside __ ___
quiz.explanation: 下面，汽车的下面。The mechanic inspected the underside of car for damage. 机械师检查汽车的下面是否有损坏。

quiz.question: ________ wayside
quiz.explanation: 路边，路边。They stopped at a roadside wayside rest area. 他们在路边的休息区停了下来。

quiz.question: ___ betide
quiz.explanation: 降临，祸事降临。Woe betide anyone who crosses the angry king. 祸事降临任何触怒国王的人。

quiz.question: seclude _______
quiz.explanation: 隔离，隔离自己。The writer would seclude oneself to focus on work. 作家会隔离自己以专注于工作。

quiz.question: elude _______
quiz.explanation: 躲避，躲避捕捉。The fugitive managed to elude capture for months. 逃犯设法躲避捕捉数月之久。

quiz.question: delude _______
quiz.explanation: 欺骗，欺骗自己。Don't delude oneself into thinking it will be easy. 不要欺骗自己以为这会很容易。

quiz.question: ________ collude
quiz.explanation: 串通，秘密串通。The companies would secretly collude to fix prices. 这些公司会秘密串通定价。

quiz.question: protrude _______
quiz.explanation: 突出，向外突出。The broken bone would protrude outward through the skin. 断骨会向外突出穿过皮肤。

quiz.question: _______ aptitude
quiz.explanation: 天赋，天生的天赋。She showed a natural aptitude for mathematics. 她表现出对数学的天生的天赋。

quiz.question: ______ servitude
quiz.explanation: 奴役，被迫的奴役。The prisoners endured years of forced servitude. 囚犯们忍受了多年的被迫的奴役。

quiz.question: banshee ____
quiz.explanation: 女妖，女妖的哀嚎。The haunting banshee wail echoed through the night. 令人毛骨悚然的女妖的哀嚎在夜晚回荡。

quiz.question: ________ glee
quiz.explanation: 欢乐，孩子般的欢乐。The children laughed with childish glee at the puppet show. 孩子们对木偶戏发出孩子般的欢乐笑声。

quiz.question: née _____
quiz.explanation: 娘家姓，娘家姓史密斯。Mrs. Johnson, née Smith, attended her high school reunion. 约翰逊夫人，娘家姓史密斯，参加了她的高中同学会。

quiz.question: ____ addressee
quiz.explanation: 收件人，亲爱的收件人。The letter began with 'Dear addressee' as a formal greeting. 这封信以'亲爱的收件人'作为正式问候开头。

quiz.question: goatee _____
quiz.explanation: 山羊胡，山羊胡。The artist grew a distinctive goatee beard. 这位艺术家留了独特的山羊胡。

quiz.question: penknife _____
quiz.explanation: 小折刀，小折刀刀片。He sharpened the penknife blade on a whetstone. 他在磨刀石上磨小折刀刀片。

quiz.question: _____ strife
quiz.explanation: 冲突，内部冲突。The nation was torn apart by civil strife. 国家被内部冲突撕裂。

quiz.question: birdcage ____
quiz.explanation: 鸟笼，鸟笼门。She opened the birdcage door to let the canary fly free. 她打开鸟笼门让金丝雀自由飞翔。

quiz.question: ___ bandage
quiz.explanation: 绷带，手臂绷带。The nurse applied an arm bandage to the wound. 护士在伤口上缠上手臂绷带。

quiz.question: ______ poundage
quiz.explanation: 重量税，进口重量税。The customs officer calculated the import poundage on the shipment. 海关官员计算了货物的进口重量税。

quiz.question: disengage ____
quiz.explanation: 脱离，脱离齿轮。The driver needed to disengage gear before starting the engine. 司机需要在启动发动机前脱离齿轮。

quiz.question: ______ miscarriage
quiz.explanation: 流产，悲惨的流产。The couple mourned their tragic miscarriage. 这对夫妇哀悼他们悲惨的流产。

quiz.question: _____ wreckage
quiz.explanation: 残骸，飞机残骸。Investigators examined the plane wreckage for clues. 调查人员检查飞机残骸寻找线索。

quiz.question: ______ rummage
quiz.explanation: 翻找，车库翻找。She found treasures at the garage rummage sale. 她在车库翻找旧货售卖中发现了宝藏。

quiz.question: ____ plumage
quiz.explanation: 羽毛，鸟类羽毛。The peacock displayed its colorful bird plumage. 孔雀展示其色彩斑斓的鸟类羽毛。

quiz.question: orphanage ____
quiz.explanation: 孤儿院，孤儿院家园。The children lived in an orphanage home until adopted. 孩子们在孤儿院家园生活直到被收养。

quiz.question: ______ carnage
quiz.explanation: 大屠杀，血腥的大屠杀。The battlefield was a scene of bloody carnage. 战场是血腥的大屠杀场景。

quiz.question: _______ rampage
quiz.explanation: 暴怒，暴力的暴怒。The bull went on a violent rampage through the streets. 公牛在街上进行暴力的暴怒。

quiz.question: overage ___
quiz.explanation: 超额，超额费用。The phone company charged an overage fee for extra data usage. 电话公司对额外数据使用收取超额费用。

quiz.question: enrage _____
quiz.explanation: 激怒，激怒人群。The politician's comments would enrage crowd at the rally. 政客的评论会在集会上激怒人群。

quiz.question: forage ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 觅食，觅食。The squirrels would forage for food throughout the autumn. 松鼠会在整个秋天觅食。

quiz.question: ______ outrage
quiz.explanation: 愤怒，公众愤怒。The scandal caused widespread public outrage. 这一丑闻引起了广泛的公众愤怒。

quiz.question: discourage ______
quiz.explanation: 使气馁，使努力气馁。Don't let failure discourage effort to improve. 不要让失败使努力气馁。

quiz.question: _____ visage
quiz.explanation: 面容，人类面容。The statue bore a serene human visage. 雕像有着宁静的人类面容。

quiz.question: _____ parentage
quiz.explanation: 血统，皇室血统。The prince was proud of his royal parentage. 王子为他的皇室血统感到自豪。

quiz.question: __________ sabotage
quiz.explanation: 破坏，工业破坏。The factory suspected industrial sabotage when machines failed. 当机器出故障时，工厂怀疑是工业破坏。

quiz.question: ____ lovage
quiz.explanation: 欧当归，欧当归草药。The chef used herb lovage to flavor the soup. 厨师用欧当归草药给汤调味。

quiz.question: cadge _ ____
quiz.explanation: 乞求，乞求搭车。He tried to cadge a ride to the city. 他试图乞求搭车去城里。

quiz.question: ______ ledge
quiz.explanation: 窗台，窗台。The cat sat on the window ledge watching birds. 猫坐在窗台上看鸟。

quiz.question: _____ fledge
quiz.explanation: 羽翼丰满，年幼的羽翼丰满。The young fledge birds left the nest for the first time. 年幼的羽翼丰满的鸟第一次离开巢穴。

quiz.question: ____ sledge
quiz.explanation: 雪橇，雪橇。The children pulled their snow sledge up the hill. 孩子们把雪橇拉上山。

quiz.question: _____ dredge
quiz.explanation: 挖泥船，河流挖泥船。The workers operated a river dredge to deepen the channel. 工人们操作河流挖泥船加深河道。

quiz.question: ____ midge
quiz.explanation: 蠓，微小的蠓。A swarm of tiny midge insects filled the air. 一群微小的蠓虫充满了空气。

quiz.question: dodge ______
quiz.explanation: 躲避，躲避子弹。The hero managed to dodge bullet in the shootout. 英雄在枪战中设法躲避子弹。

quiz.question: dislodge _____
quiz.explanation: 移开，移开石头。They used a crowbar to dislodge stone blocking the path. 他们用撬棍移开挡路的石头。

quiz.question: ___'_ budge
quiz.explanation: 移动，不会移动。The stubborn mule won't budge no matter what. 固执的骡子无论如何都不会移动。

quiz.question: ___ smudge
quiz.explanation: 污迹，墨水污迹。She noticed an ink smudge on the important document. 她注意到重要文件上有墨水污迹。

quiz.question: ____ _ nudge
quiz.explanation: 轻推，轻推一下。She would give a nudge to wake her sleeping friend. 她会轻推一下唤醒她睡着的朋友。

quiz.question: ____ trudge
quiz.explanation: 跋涉，缓慢的跋涉。It was a long slow trudge through the deep snow. 这是穿过深雪的漫长缓慢的跋涉。

quiz.question: allege _____
quiz.explanation: 声称，声称犯罪。The prosecution would allege crime without sufficient evidence. 检方会在没有充分证据的情况下声称犯罪。

quiz.question: ____ obliged
quiz.explanation: 有义务的，感到有义务。I feel obliged to help after all you've done for me. 在你为我做了这么多之后，我感到有义务帮忙。

quiz.question: _______ vestige
quiz.explanation: 遗迹，古代遗迹。Archaeologists discovered an ancient vestige of civilization. 考古学家发现了古代遗迹的文明。

quiz.question: bilge _____
quiz.explanation: 舱底污水，舱底污水。The sailors pumped bilge water out of the ship. 水手们把舱底污水从船里抽出来。

quiz.question: ___ bulge
quiz.explanation: 凸出，眼睛凸出。His eye bulge in surprise at the shocking news. 他的眼睛因震惊的消息而凸出。

quiz.question: divulge ______
quiz.explanation: 泄露，泄露秘密。She refused to divulge secret to anyone. 她拒绝向任何人泄露秘密。

quiz.question: ______ blancmange
quiz.explanation: 牛奶冻，奶油牛奶冻。The dessert was a sweet, creamy blancmange. 甜点是一种甜美的奶油牛奶冻。

quiz.question: ______ derange
quiz.explanation: 使精神错乱，精神错乱。The trauma could mental derange even the strongest person. 创伤可能使最坚强的人精神错乱。

quiz.question: prearrange _______
quiz.explanation: 预先安排，预先安排会议。They decided to prearrange meeting before the conference. 他们决定在会议前预先安排会议。

quiz.question: scavenge ____
quiz.explanation: 搜寻，搜寻食物。The homeless man would scavenge food from dumpsters. 无家可归的人会从垃圾箱搜寻食物。

quiz.question: unhinge ____
quiz.explanation: 使精神错乱，使精神错乱。The terrifying experience would unhinge mind of the victim. 可怕的经历会使受害者的精神错乱。

quiz.question: cringe __ ____
quiz.explanation: 畏缩，恐惧地畏缩。The dog would cringe in fear at loud noises. 狗会对巨大的噪音恐惧地畏缩。

quiz.question: singe ____
quiz.explanation: 烧焦，烧焦头发。The candle flame would singe hair if you got too close. 如果你靠得太近，蜡烛火焰会烧焦头发。

quiz.question: ______ tinge
quiz.explanation: 淡淡的色彩，淡淡的色彩。The sunset had a slight tinge of pink in the clouds. 日落时云中有淡淡的粉红色彩。

quiz.question: ____ ___ swinge
quiz.explanation: 鞭打，鞭打。The cruel captain would flog and swinge disobedient sailors. 残忍的船长会鞭打不服从的水手。

quiz.question: _____ twinge
quiz.explanation: 刺痛，剧烈的刺痛。She felt a sharp twinge in her back when lifting the box. 她抬箱子时感到背部剧烈的刺痛。

quiz.question: _______ lunge
quiz.explanation: 猛冲，向前猛冲。The fencer made a forward lunge to strike the opponent. 击剑手向前猛冲攻击对手。

quiz.question: scrounge _____
quiz.explanation: 乞讨，乞讨钱。He had to scrounge money for bus fare. 他不得不乞讨钱买公交车票。

quiz.question: _____ barge
quiz.explanation: 驳船，货运驳船。The cargo barge transported goods down the river. 货运驳船沿河运输货物。

quiz.question: __ ___ verge
quiz.explanation: 边缘，在边缘上。She was on the verge of tears after the sad news. 听到悲伤的消息后，她在哭泣的边缘上。

quiz.question: ______ converge
quiz.explanation: 汇聚，力量汇聚。The military forces converge on the strategic location. 军事力量汇聚在战略位置。

quiz.question: disgorge ________
quiz.explanation: 吐出，吐出内容物。The volcano would disgorge contents of molten lava. 火山会吐出熔岩的内容物。

quiz.question: ______ upsurge
quiz.explanation: 激增，突然的激增。There was a sudden upsurge in demand for the product. 对该产品的需求出现了突然的激增。

quiz.question: _____ deluge
quiz.explanation: 洪水，巨大的洪水。The region experienced a great deluge during monsoon season. 该地区在季风季节经历了巨大的洪水。

quiz.question: gouge ___
quiz.explanation: 挖出，挖出。The sculptor would gouge out the marble to create the statue. 雕刻家会挖出大理石来创作雕像。
